actions: Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood, nourishes Jing and expels Wind from the skin by nourishing the Blood.
Nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin and benefits Jing.
With Shu Di Huang, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency.
With Shu Di Huang, Tu Si Zi and Du Zhong, for dizziness, weakness, impotence, and spermatorrhea due to Kidney and Liver Yin and Blood Deficiency.
Tonifies the Kidneys and Liver and aids the smooth flow of Qi and Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Jing.
With Gou Qi Zi, for Kidney Jing and Liver Deficiency.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, benefits the marrow and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver.
With Du Zhong, enriches and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, astringes Jing, nourishes Kidney Yin.
Releases the Exterior, disperses Cold and guides Qi to the Tai Yang and Du channels.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Cools the Blood and drains Yin Deficiency Fire.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

symptoms: Aching, soreness or weakness of low back
Low grade fever in the afternoon
Dry throat, maybe recurrent sore throat

notes: The best conditions to treat with this formula are alopecia areata and alopecia totalis; results for alopecia universalis are not so good.
